Verses: 1 yaakkobu Than Kangalai Eretuththu, Idho, Esaavum Avanodekooda Naanooru Manidharum Varugiradhaik Kandu, Pillaigalai Leyaalidaththilum Raagelidaththilum Irandu Panividaikkaarigalidaththilum Vevveraagap Piriththuvaiththu,
2 panividaikkaarigalaiyum Avargal Pillaigalaiyum Mudhalilum, Leyaalaiyum Aval Pillaigalaiyum Idaiyilum, Raagelaiyum Yoseppaiyum Kadaiyilum Niruththi:
3 thaan Avargalukku Munnaaga Nadandhu Poi, Ezhuvisai Tharaimattum Kunindhu Vanangi, Than Sagodharan Kittach Serndhaan.
4 appozhudhu Esaa Edhirkondu Odivandhu, Avanaith Thazhuvi, Avan Kazhuththaik Kattikkondu, Avanai Muththanjeydhaan; Iruvarum Azhudhaargal.
5 avan Than Kangalai Eretuththu, Sthireegalaiyum Pillaigalaiyum Kandu: Unnodirukkira Ivargal Yaar? Endraan. Adharku Avan: Dhevan Umadhu Adiyaanukku Arulina Pillaigal Endraan.
6 appozhudhu Panividaikkaarigalum Avargal Pillaigalum Serndhuvandhu Vananginaargal.
7 leyaalum Aval Pillaigalum Serndhuvandhu Vananginaargal; Pinbu Yoseppum Raagelum Serndhuvandhu Vananginaargal.
8 appozhudhu Avan: Enakku Edhirkonduvandha Andha Mandhaiyellaam Ennaththukku Endraan. Adharku Avan: En Aandavanudaiya Kangalil Enakkuth Dhayavu Kidaikkiradharku Endraan.
9 adharku Esaa: En Sagodharane, Enakkup Podhumaanadhu Undu; Unnudaiyadhu Unakku Irukkattum Endraan.

10 adharku Yaakkobu: Appadi Alla, Ummudaiya Kangalil Enakkuth Dhayavu Kidaiththadheyaanaal, En Vegumadhiyai En Kaiyilirundhu Etrukkollum; Neer Enmel Piriyamaaneer, Naan Ummudaiya Mugaththaik Kandadhu Dhevanudaiya Mugaththaik Kandadhupola Irukkiradhu.

11 dhevan Enakku Anukkiragam Seydhirukkiraar; Vendiyadhellaam Enakku Undu; Aagaiyaal Umakkuk Konduvarappatta En Kaanikkaiyai Etrukkollum Endru Solli, Avanai Varundhik Kettukkondaan; Appozhudhu Avan Adhai Etrukkondaan.
12 pinbu Avan: Naam Purappattup Povom Vaa, Naan Unakku Mun Nadappen Endraan.

13 adharku Avan: Pillaigal Ilam Pillaigal Endrum, Karavaiyaana Aadumaadugal Ennidaththil Irukkiradhu Endrum En Aandavanukkuth Theriyum; Avaigalai Oru Naalaavadhu Thuridhamaai Ottinaal, Mandhaiyellaam Maandupom.

14  En Aandavanaagiya Neer Umadhu Adiyaanukku Munne Pom; Naan Seyeerukku En Aandavanidaththil Varumalavum, Enakkumun Nadakkira Mandhaigalin Kaalnadaikkum Pillaigalin Kaalnadaikkum Thakkadhaaga, Medhuvaai Avaigalai Nadaththikkondu Varugiren Endraan.

15 appozhudhu Esaa: Ennidaththilirukkira Janangalil Silarai Naan Unnidaththil Niruththivittup Pogattumaa Endraan. Adharku Avan: Adhu Ennaththirku, En Aandavanudaiya Kangalil Enakkuth Dhayavukidaiththaal Maaththiram Podhum Endraan.
16 andraiththinam Esaa Thirumbith Thaan Vandha Vazhiye Seyeerukkup Ponaan.
17 yaakkobu Sukkoththirku Pirayaanampanni, Thanakku Oru Veetu Katti, Than Mirugajeevangalukkuk Kottaarangalaip Pottaan; Adhinaale Andha Sthalaththukkuch Sukkodh Endru Perittaan.
18 yaakkobu Padhaan Araamilirundhu Vandhapin Kaanaan Dhesaththilirukkira Saalem Ennum Seekemudaiya Pattanaththirku Aruge Sendru Pattanaththirku Edhire Koodaarampottaan.
19 thaan Koodaaram Potta Veliyin Nilaththaich Seekemin Thagappanaagiya Emorin Puththirar Kaiyile Nooru Vellik Kaasukkuk Kondu,
20 ange Oru Palibeedaththaik Katti, Adharku Elelloke Isravel Endru Perittaan.
